A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: First off\, I did not read any of the reviews prior to watching this movie. Second\, I’m a SW geek and I’ll admit that. That said\, I was very disappointed to where I felt a strong need to review this film and am actually looking forward to Christmas than seeing it a second time tomorrow. In summary\, the early part of the movie is slow and seemingly treaded over similar territory with the original trilogy. The middle part was a bit confusing and without a purpose other than to take a screen time. The third act was decent\, but again felt like you’ve seen it before. There are some terrific visuals....and that’s about the high point. We shall see what comes of Episode IX...
